subtitle: remember your actions matter in Judaism
and Torah we always knew that action has
that butterfly ripple effect that can
transform the world so even though we
may not be in Israel we may be thousands
of miles away your good deed your
kindness your Mitzvah
matters the first maybe above all is
Unity this is a time for Unity enemies
cannot attack a unify people they can
attack when we're weak and divided Unity
is critical both in Israel and abroad so
now is a good time to make peace with
someone you may have called your enemy
Rifts in communities in
families even among strangers do

Rifts call someone that you didn't speak
